commits.author: Dawid Weiss
commits.sourceNew: /** Checks the internal cache for an appropriate entry, and if none is * found, reads the terms in field as a single byte and returns an array * of size reader.maxDoc() of the value each document * has in the given field. * @param reader Used to get field values. * @param field Which field contains the single byte values. * @return The values in the given field for each document. * @throws IOException If any error occurs. */ public byte[] getBytes (IndexReader reader, String field) throws IOException;
commits.sourceOld: /** Checks the internal cache for an appropriate entry, and if none is * found, reads the terms in field as a single byte and returns an array * of size reader.maxDoc() of the value each document * has in the given field. * @param reader Used to get field values. * @param field Which field contains the single byte values. * @return The values in the given field for each document. * @throws IOException If any error occurs. */ public byte[] getBytes (IndexReader reader, String field) throws IOException;

commits.author: Michael McCandless
commits.sourceNew: /** Checks the internal cache for an appropriate entry, and if none is * found, reads the terms in field as a single byte and returns an array * of size reader.maxDoc() of the value each document * has in the given field. * @param reader Used to get field values. * @param field Which field contains the single byte values. * @param setDocsWithField If true then {@link #getDocsWithField} will * also be computed and stored in the FieldCache. * @return The values in the given field for each document. * @throws IOException If any error occurs. */ public byte[] getBytes (IndexReader reader, String field, boolean setDocsWithField) throws IOException;
commits.sourceOld: /** Checks the internal cache for an appropriate entry, and if none is * found, reads the terms in field as a single byte and returns an array * of size reader.maxDoc() of the value each document * has in the given field. * @param reader Used to get field values. * @param field Which field contains the single byte values. * @return The values in the given field for each document. * @throws IOException If any error occurs. */ public byte[] getBytes (IndexReader reader, String field) throws IOException;
